channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Applying the Christmas Story to the Abortion Abolition Movement’s Proposed Law [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Last week another video was released by EndAbortionNow.com “revealing the main issue” that “is keeping abortion alive in this nation.” Surprised by what it was, David puts in under the microscope of the good news that is the Christmas story, asking if the new law the movement proposes can be the death knell to abortion in our nation?
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: What’s Missing from Christian Political Engagement? [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Fundamental theological truths about God are generally considered unimportant to Christian political engagement. David explains why that is the problem. This episode will help you evaluate whether the politicians and policy and legal organizations you support can make a difference.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: A 1938 SCOTUS Decision and the Rise of “Nominal Christianity” [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: A decision by the U.S. Supreme Court in 1938 rejected the Christian understanding of the world and, therefore, it changed our understanding of law. David will explain the decision and give examples from his lobbying work to demonstrate how it helped change Christianity. It gave rise to what he calls “nominal Christianity.”
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
